venue.address_1: Fanueil Hall Marketplace, Quincy Market Building, 2nd Floor
venue.name: Parris Lounge at Ned Devine's

item.description:
Generally at least once a year the Young Professional Network of the Boston Society of Architects (YPNet/ BSA) joins the Boston Area Young Real Estate Professionals (BAYREP) for a social/ networking event. This time it looks like a great event for a great cause!

------------------------------------------------

BAYREP Benefit for Haley House
Tickets: $20 in advance, $30 at the door

Each year, BAYREP and a network of co-hosts hold a networking evening to raise money for a deserving non-profit. This year?s beneficiary is Haley House, a trim, feisty non-profit, started in 1966 in Boston's South End. The organization?s food program serves 40,000 meals per year to the homeless, its food pantry distributes 16,000 pounds of food per year, it owns/manages 107 units of affordable housing in the South End, and uses its bakery job training program to provide new skills and job opportunities to the chronically underemployed in the heart of Boston.

Please join us for this fun and worthwhile networking event! All event revenues go directly to Haley House: http://www.haleyhouse...

More information about this event is available at the BAYREP website:
http://www.bayrep.org...

Event Co-Hosted by: Black Architects Forum (BSA committee), BosNoma, Boston Society of Architects Young Professionals Network (YPNet of BSA), CHAPA, Community Design Resource Center of Boston, Congress For New Urbanism Next Generation, Harvard?s Housing GSD, NAIOP Developing Leaders, NEWIRE, MIT Housing Group, REFA, and ULI Young Leaders Group

Event Sponsors: Aerotek, Anglo Irish Bank, Architectural Heritage Foundation, BU Center for Professional Education, Cornerstone Realty Consultants, Fidelity National Title, Nutter and Recap Advisors, Tranzon Auction Properties

Sponsorships: Haley House needs your company to sponsor! Sponsorship levels range from $100 to $1,000+. This is a great way to ?do good? and get inexpensive publicity with BAYREP?s membership base of over 800! Sponsoring companies receive free event tickets.
item.name: Benefit for Haley House at Parris Lounge/ Ned Devine's
